# Mewgenics Guide
> A focused community wiki for Mewgenics strategies, breeding mechanics, class planning, and survival systems.
This site provides practical run-focused guidance, quick reference data, and updated beginner resources.

## Core Content
- [Beginner Guide](https://mewgenicsguide.online/guides/beginner/): Essential survival tips for early runs.
- [Breeding Mechanics](https://mewgenicsguide.online/guides/breeding/): Inheritance basics and mutation strategy.
- [Classes Database](https://mewgenicsguide.online/database/classes/): Role summaries and ability overview.
- [Furniture List](https://mewgenicsguide.online/database/furniture/): Base items, costs, and effects.

## Common Resources
- [Homepage](https://mewgenicsguide.online/): Overview, workflow, and FAQ.
- [Contact](mailto:tangjei414@gmail.com): Feedback and correction channel.

## Optional
- [Privacy Policy](https://mewgenicsguide.online/privacy/): Privacy commitments for this site.
- [Terms of Use](https://mewgenicsguide.online/terms/): Usage and content terms.
